name: Problemlöser
description:
Hans the hero has just finished school and is looking for a way to become an IT professional to earn money for more gadgets for his eSports hobby.

Luckily, he gets an offer to become a trainee in an IT company. The CIO, has a first project for him to check some code to squeeze bugs.

Take control of the new IT trainee in this 2D action game and avoid collisions with the IT professionals. Debug scripts to find bugs to squeeze. More administrators are waiting for you in each level. Remember, your time is limited! If that sounds too easy, try 8 different difficulty levels.

The game has a unique way of controlling the hero. As you try to find the optimal path through the level, it's a challenge to stay focused and keep an eye on all the administrators.
